# Filtering responses

```{r}
selected <- combo %>% 
  select("StartDate","EndDate","Progress","RecipientEmail", "ResponseId", "Survey", "Q1_1", "Q1_2", "Q1_3", "Q1_4", "Q2")%>%
  arrange(StartDate)%>%
write_csv("combo_organize.csv")
```
```{r}
Q1_1 <- selected %>%
  select("Q1_1", "Survey")%>%
  count()
```
